snippet: A suicide bomber blew himself up at the gates of a church in the northeastern city of Gombe during a New Year’s Day service, wounding eight people.
abstract: Nigeria's Red Cross reports suicide bomber wounded eight people at church in Gombe during New Year's Day service; no group has claimed responsibility for attack but Boko Haram fighters have been known to stray from states where they normally operate.
lead_paragraph: A suicide bomber blew himself up at the gates of a church in the northeastern city of Gombe during a New Year’s Day service, wounding eight people.
